items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect dress for wedding
items.body: amazing dress! This dress is not only so comfortable but makes me feel like a princess. I have never felt so beautiful in a dress! If I could give 20 stars I would ! Read more
items.author: Sierra McKay

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute-better than imagined and size accommodating.
items.body: Super cute! Comfortable, affordable and it was perfect length. I did have to adjust the off shoulder straps to fit me properly. It appears like a non stretchy material but the back is an elastic stretchy fabric that accommodates shape very well. I absolutely could’ve sized down. 250lbs 5ft 2in. It falls above my feet so your shoes do show. Read more
items.author: Kota

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Its beautiful like the picture
items.body: This was such a beautiful dress for my Gala! True to size. Read more
items.author: May

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress get it
items.body: I'm a size 2x 3x and the dress fit perfect. I am 5'3 I did feel like the dress was a little too long for me. The corset area was not as tight as I would like but that's good if you are busty. The design is what it is. The quality was great. I think overall value for money you get what you get. Not to mention it was comfortable, not itchy, not too stiff but flowy. Read more
items.author: Amanda

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect dress
items.body: Love love love!! I wore this to a wedding in LA got so many compliments. Read more
items.author: Britt

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Evening Off Shoulder Formal Maxi Cocktail is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Evening Off Shoulder Formal Maxi Cocktail is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Black Dress Red Floral. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
